resources.string:
Welcome to the PubMatic's SDK Sample app.

 This application helps you to test PubMatic's ad tag. PubMatic has multiple ad serving platforms mentioned below:
 1. Mocean serves direct ads mainly for Mobile devices
 2. PubMatic SSP

 How to use:
 1. Please select the Platform
 2. Please select the desired ad format
 3. Input your ad tag details. By default app is configured with test ad tag details. Please contact PubMatic to get new ad tags for your app.
 4. Optionally you can configure other targetting parameters for better monetisation.
 5. App also provides Settings screen which allows to apply global settings for all platform and ad type.

 Contact:
 To monetize your app using PubMatic platform, Please contact support@pubmatic.com
